name: damageable
help_text: Whether or not the feature is damageable, if set to 0, the 'x' cursor will appear instead of the 'attack' cursor.

name: lineOfSight
help_text: Line Of Sight. Whether of not units and structures can see through them and shoot at objects behind them

name: startVisible
help_text: Whether or not the feature is visible even if you haven't explored that area of terrain yet

name: armour
help_text: Armour of the feature, similar to armour used on buildings.
